homepage.subtitle: Production of websites, apps and digital presence

websites_category_page.description: The internet revolutionized the way people access information, goods, and services. This revolution has led to numerous companies and entrepreneurs seeing an opportunity to promote their businesses without limiting their customers to a geographical location or operating hours, bringing a competitive advantage compared to those who do not have the same visibility. Currently, the digital presence of any business is crucial for its growth. To your right, you can find some of the work that I have developed throughout my career.

apps_category_page.description: Mobile applications allow for faster and easier access to the product, resulting in greater proximity and involvement of customers with the business. When you have an app available in digital stores, such as Google Play or the Apple Store, the user can download your business directly to their mobile phone, becoming available 24 hours for personal use and adapted to the operating system, improving the experience and quality of service. To your right, you can find some of the apps that I have developed throughout my career.

about_me.title: About me
about_me.description: Ever since I decided to make my passion for technology a professional career, I have been fully dedicated to the development of digital projects and the acquisition of new knowledge, in order to add competitive value in the creation of digital solutions. My attention to detail, creative vision of the world and meticulous nature are the main contributions of my identity to the development and implementation of custom solutions. Throughout my career, I have developed projects for various sectors and I am mainly dedicated to creating websites, web apps, and branding. My primary goal is to highlight the identity and increase the visibility of the brands in the digital market.

experience.title: Experience
experience.web_basics: Created and optimized projects using web basics (HTML, CSS, and SASS) and modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks like React.js, React Native, Next JS, Typescript and adjusting advanced state-management with Redux and React Context;
experience.web_advanced: Improved skills in back-end, creating API's with Node JS, connecting databases with MongoDB and using Docker to deploy and consume locally through RESTfull API requests.
experience.business: Structured, applied, and enhanced front-end architecture and data-structure to improve efficiency and sustainability, tailored to the business area;
experience.arquitecture: Skilled in using microservices and event-driven architecture to develop and maintain features, and taking ownership of the development process from design and code review to implementation;
experience.responsive: Standardized all output with a new, responsive, mobile-first-approach through advanced responsive web design and UX/UI best practices through Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, media queries, responsive layouts and performance best pratices;
experience.testing: Experience with testing frameworks, performance testing, and unit testing with Jest, React Testing Library and Cypress.
